    • populateStagingTable

      public static void populateStagingTable(Bundle bundle, boolean executeCallbacks)
      Deprecated.
      Use saveBundleToStagingTables() instead
      Populates staging tables from the beans in a given bundle
      Parameters:
      bundle - The bundle to load into staging tables
      executeCallbacks - Whether to execute the beforeInsert callbacks before populating staging tables.

    • saveBundleToStagingTables

      public static void saveBundleToStagingTables(Bundle bundle, boolean executeCallbacks)
      Populates staging tables from the beans in a given bundle
      Parameters:
      bundle - The bundle to load into staging tables
      executeCallbacks - Whether to execute the beforeInsert callbacks before populating staging tables.

    • saveBuildersInStagingTablesAndLoad

      public static TableImportResult saveBuildersInStagingTablesAndLoad(boolean allowExistingRefs, Bundle bundle) throws Exception
      Deprecated.
      Use saveBundleToStagingTablesAndLoad() instead
      Populates the staging tables from the given bundle, then loads the staging tables.
      Parameters:
      allowExistingRefs - Whether to allow references to existing non-adming data in source tables.
      bundle - The bundle to load into staging tables.
      Returns:
      Results from the load operation.
      Throws:
      Exception - Exceptions from the load operation.

    • saveBundleToStagingTablesAndLoad

      Returns:
      Results from the load operation.

      public static TableImportResult integrityCheckLoadAndExpectErrors(Boolean allowExistingRefs, int numExpectedErrors) throws Exception
      Deprecated.
      Use runIntegrityChecksOnStagingTablesAndLoadExpectingErrors() instead
      Parameters:
      allowExistingRefs - Whether to allow references to existing non-adming data in source tables.

      Exception - Exceptions from the load operation.
